title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure of NeuroLegalTestimonyAnalyzer, considering frontend, backend, and database requirements.

title: Develop Frontend Interface Design
description: Design user-friendly interfaces for data input, analysis display, and results interpretation.

title: Develop Backend Algorithm for Neural Analysis
description: Create an algorithm capable of analyzing neural activity patterns and determining veracity of testimony.

title: Implement Database Schema
description: Design and implement a database schema for storing neural analysis data and other relevant information.

title: Integrate Frontend with Backend
description: Connect the frontend interfaces to the backend analysis functionality.
dependencies: Develop Backend Algorithm for Neural Analysis

title: Test System Functionality
description: Perform thorough testing to ensure system is functioning correctly and efficiently.

title: Write Documentation for System Usage and Development
description: Create clear documentation for users and developers on system usage, development setup, and testing procedures.

title: Review and Iterate on System Design
description: Review the system design, address any issues, and iterate as necessary.
dependencies: Develop Backend Algorithm for Neural Analysis
